content: Hello!! I am having difficulty accessing the HKN Tutoring Services website. Can you please help me find the link at your leisure? Thank you!!
subject: Accessing HKN Tutoring Website?

content: I am also having trouble loading the HKN website. It could be that certificates need to be installed? I will play around and let you know.

From the intel that I've gathered, HKN has either been inactive or disbanded in the past few years. This is extremely disappointing if so, as I know the tutoring services were a great resource for students. The good news is that there is a ton of help available in this course, whether it be through weekly recitations, piazza, and office hours. If you need a bit more personal help, I'm certain that an LA or TA in office hours will be able to take the time to explain concepts more in depth. If this still isn't working, please reach out to us and we can figure out an alternative.
Hi!! Thank you so, so much for the super detailed and supportive answer!! Means a lot!!
